name: Avoid undocumented Header files
description: This rule searches for C/C++ header files that do not contain any comments to document the content.
output:
Associated to each C/C++ header file with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- header file name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code.
remediation: Insert comments to document the objective and the content of the header files.
